TEXT.S: Puerto rico Itini i 18 15 N, 66 30 W, noNotimolan Amilika ko Puerto rico. Polong no sekalay i 13,791 sq km "saka 163 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 8,870 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 4,921 sq km " Polong i 3,578,056 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 22 , Malo no kilakilangan a sera 63.20 , malo no roma to a sera 14.80 . siyoto O [[[San Juan]] ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakapito 4 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Donald John Trump, patirengan a romi'ad i 2017 a miheca saka 1 folad saka 20 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA List of current heads of state and government
